release.change: Add user selectable option 'Delete account on server' when user remove an account; user must login to perform this action
While user is login, changing local password will also change password on the server
Remove Desktop, SIP and ICQ protocols and preference settings support
Remove aTalk unused codec, audio system and unused classes: portaudio, pulseaudio, quicktime, and video4Linux
Merged CallEnded with VideoCallActivity; Auto return to contactList 3 seconds after call has ended
Remove OTR encryption and Desktop support
Update all aTalk JNI libraries build to use NDK '22.1.7171670'
Upgrade jni libraries sources for:libvpx 1.13.0 to 1.13.1; ffmpeg 5.1.2 to 5.1.4
Clean up JNI scripts for all native libraries built, and use prebuilt toolchain
Build openssl jni library without installing the man document
Move project name space to org.atalk.hmos
Migrate ice4j to only compatible with API-24
